# ðŸŽ¥ Celebrity Basic

All Crewmates see the Kill-Flash when Celebrity dies. And get an Alert in the next Meeting. The Impostors (and Neutrals depending on Settings) donâ€™t know anything about this.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Celebrities that can be in a match
  • Impostors know when the Celebrity dies
    • ON: Impostors can see the kill flash of when the Celebrity dies
    • OFF: Impostors cannot tell when a Celebrity gets killed
  • Neutrals know when the Celebrity dies
    • ON: Neutrals can see the kill flash of when the Celebrity dies
    • OFF: Neutrals cannot tell when a Celebrity gets killed.

From: Goose Goose Duck & Coding: KARPED1EMopen in new window
